name: Out of Sight
summary: Out of Sight is an urban fantasy story-driven 2D adventure game inspired by Slavic mythology. Set in the present of the decaying mining town in the Mostecko region, archaeology student Nela has to use her wit and knowledge to uncover the truth behind the strange occurrences.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Ready Set Indie Games Presents: Out of Sight (PC)
